photos.title: Family Portrait
photos.description: Seat the parents on a stool holding the baby. Position the older children standing beside them to create a cozy family atmosphere.

photos.title: Group Circle Shot
photos.description: Ask the group to stand in a circle and lean in so their heads touch, creating a dynamic and fun shot.

photos.title: Casual Friends Gathering
photos.description: Seat one person with a laptop and arrange the others around them, creating a friendly conversation atmosphere.

photos.title: Outdoor Chat
photos.description: Position the models next to a wall and give them drinks. They can chat freely, creating a relaxed atmosphere.

photos.title: Kids Party Fun
photos.description: Have the children stand in a row, wearing party hats and throwing confetti to create a fun and festive atmosphere.

photos.title: Wedding Pyramid
photos.description: Create a pyramid by asking the men to get on all fours and the bride to stand on top. This adds originality and fun to the shot.

photos.title: Friends Lying Down
photos.description: Ask the group to lie on the ground in a circle with their heads touching in the center. This creates an intimate and connected feel.

photos.title: Staircase Formation
photos.description: Arrange the group in a line on the stairs, each personâ€™s arms spread out, creating a visually interesting and unified look.

photos.title: Sleepy Circle
photos.description: Have the group stand close together with their heads tilted and eyes closed, creating a serene and peaceful atmosphere.

photos.title: Close Trio
photos.description: Position three people close together, their heads slightly tilted, to create a strong and intimate portrait.
